channel.title: Run3server
channel.description:
I was wondering why it was censored on here.
Anyone care to tell me?
Is it because people were advertising and saying its better than this site?
kthx

item.title: Run3server
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:7, topic:202559”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=267225.msg2207054#msg2207054 date=1209676453]
A couple of months ago they had a team and were massively spamming here and advertising their site.
[/quote]
Your site has been spammed but it is not censored?[/quote]
Tico135’s reply explains the biggest part.
There also is a difference between linking to the site, and posting 400 threads and setting up spam-moparscape teams.

Read full topic

item.title: Run3server
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:7, topic:202559”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=267225.msg2207054#msg2207054 date=1209676453]
A couple of months ago they had a team and were massively spamming here and advertising their site.
[/quote]
Your site has been spammed but it is not censored?[/quote]

An agreement between Lothy, Ikiliki and I was made that people spamming the link here or in other communities would be severely punished there, and an announcement was posted to not disrespect other communities by spamming site links.

Read full topic

item.title: Run3server
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:4, topic:202559”]A couple of months ago they had a team and were massively spamming here and advertising their site.
And as Tico135 said, they’re still planning spamming us, they’ve even asked me a couple of times to help them spamming.

I’m thinking it was because of them spamming the serverstatus page.

Yes, they have also been doing that a few times.
As far I can remember, a few members from there started the invalid ports.[/quote]I’m suprised they even knew how to access the status page. I’ve been there a few times, and it IS as sad as most people say. Yes, it’s actually sank lower in the intelligence department than here.

Read full topic

item.title: Run3server
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

A couple of months ago they had a team and were massively spamming here and advertising their site.
And as Tico135 said, they’re still planning spamming us, they’ve even asked me a couple of times to help them spamming.

Moparisthebest:

I’m thinking it was because of them spamming the serverstatus page.

Yes, they have also been doing that a few times.
As far I can remember, a few members from there started the invalid ports.

Read full topic
